title: "Burnaby Hospital to use artificial intelligence to help detect colon cancer"
excerpt: "It can also be used to help detect colon cancer. Burnaby Hospital is one of 12 hospitals in the Fraser Health region which is being equipped with GI Genius, a computer-aided system that helps doctors improve the accuracy of colonoscopies and increase the likelihood of detecting and removing precancerous lesions."
